statements: DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 101 AND enrollment_year = 2019;
DELETE FROM student_performance WHERE course_grade = 'A' AND enrollment_year < 2020 AND course_code IN ('MATH101', 'ENG202');
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 101 AND class_grade >= 10;
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours < 3 AND course_type = 'Elective';
DELETE FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 'a3ba0182-0391-4c36-a857-2364e9641a57' AND course_id = 'b5517229-1234-4de3-9edc-6d8fd7b5e925';
DELETE FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 'b0d53b0d-2c73-4016-b632-8d06e6f4959c' AND semester = 'Fall';
